events.message: I placed an order last week but I want to return the item and get a refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The case has been categorized under Refund after reviewing the customer's request for returning the item and getting money back.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refund processing to assist further.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, please confirm the reason for return and send any photos of the product if applicable.
My order number is 123456789. The product quality is not as described and I would like to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned item. Please use the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and the return label. I will send the product back today.
We have received your returned item and processed the refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if further assistance is needed.
We have closed your case regarding the refund. Feel free to reach out anytime for any other support you may need.
